name: Embassy Suites Destin - Miramar Beach

reviews.text: The hotel was clean and the complimentary breakfast was good. We requested late check out (our flight wasn't until 5 PM) and were given a check out time of 1 PM (only 1 hour later). However, the late check request was not passed along to the housekeeping staff and we were hussled out of our room at 12:10! I know, it's only 50 minutes early but....
reviews.title: Nothing awful but nothing outstanding.

reviews.text: I would stay there again but I will see what other options I have first.
reviews.title: Greener grass elsewhere?

reviews.text: My family of four stayed for three nights in early October. It was a fairly nice hotel, across the street from a stunning beach. But compared to other Embassy Suites we've visited, this property was slightly below average overall, especially with regards to staff friendliness and the complimentary breakfast buffet. We found some staff members to be indifferent to the point of coming across as borderline rude. (Staff members with the kind of curt attitudes you might expect in NYC, but not in Destin.) Service was slow at times on the breakfast buffet. The variety of food was mildly disappointing. (For example, no ham or tomatoes for the cooked-to-order omelots.)
reviews.title: Great place to stay at the last minute.

reviews.text: Perhaps more importantly, this hotel is in an area of Destin that is completely dominated by condos. Many of the condos are considerably more attractive and more luxurious than the hotel. Although the hotel is arguably less expensive, we wish we had paid more to stay in a nice condo. We think it probably would have been worth it.
reviews.title: mixed blessings at embassy suites

reviews.text: My husband, two children, and I stayed here on Father's Day weekend. The room was clean and looked new. The hotel was up to date and clean. Great location.
reviews.title: No complaints

aka: Embassy Suites Destin - Miramar Beach Hotel
description: Embassy Suites Destin - Miramar Beach is an all-suite hotel featuring amenities designed to pamper our guests: We are across the street from the gorgeous Gulf of Mexico with a private beach access, complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast daily, complimentary Evening Reception nightly, Complimentary wired and wireless internet. Check in 4pm / Check out is 11am. Age Restrictions 25 to checkin. We are across the street from our lovely beach. 100 yards from our front door.
